text: sayaqul lak -ayha alnby- aladhin tkhllafu min al'aerab ean alkhuruj maeak 'iilaa "mk" 'iidha eatbthm: shaghalatna 'amwaluna wahlwna, fas'al rabuk 'an yaghfir lana tkhllufna, yaqulun dhlk balsnthm, wala hqyqt lah fi qlwbhm, qul lhm: faman yamlik lakum min allah shyyana 'iin 'arad bikum shrana 'aw khyrana? lays al'amr kama zana hwla' almunafiqun 'ana allah la yaelam ma antwt ealayh bwatnhm min alnfaq, bal 'iinah subhanah kan bima yaemalun khbyrana, la yakhfaa ealayh shay' min 'aemal khlqh
